column1: 272399,Counselling Psychologist,,"Counsel clients on mental health or personal achievement
column3: Collect information from people through observation, interviews or surveys
column9: Advise others on health care matters
column11: Design psychological or educational treatment procedures or programs
column13: Review professional literature to maintain professional knowledge
column15: Direct medical science or health care programs
column17: Evaluate the effectiveness of counselling or educational programs
column19: Modify treatment plans to accommodate client needs
column21: Administer standardised physical or psychological tests
column27: Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column31: Advise others on educational and student wellbeing matters
